definitions.definition: A person who is always very kind .
examples: She is such a sweetheart : she never complains about me being late.

definitions.definition: A person very much liked or loved by someone, especially when both partners are young .
examples: John married his high-school sweetheart in 1981.

definitions.definition: A term of endearment , especially for a girlfriend , fiancée , or wife .
A female member of a college or university fraternity .

main_definition: A person who is always very kind .
secondary_definitions: A person very much liked or loved by someone, especially when both partners are young .
A term of endearment , especially for a girlfriend , fiancée , or wife .
( US ) A female member of a college or university fraternity .
